Time Series Imputations¶

Last Observation Carried Forward¶

Defined in impyute.imputations.ts.locf https://github.com/eltonlaw/impyute/blob/master/impyute/imputations/ts/locf.py

locf(
 data
)

Args¶

  • data: A 2D Matrix. Must be a numpy.array https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.array.html of dtype float32, float64, int64, int32, uint8, uint16, int16, int8.
